entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light before morning. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 02 January 2023
